schema.description:
智能接入网关的名称。 

长度为2~128个字符，必须以字母或中文开头，可包含数字，点号（.），下划线（_）和短横线（-）。

智能接入网关的描述。 

长度为2~256个字符，必须以字母或中文开头，但不能以`http:// `或` https:/`/开头。

线下机构客户端用来通信的私网网段，确保各私网网段不冲突。 

如果智能接入网关终端设备的LAN口配置为动态方式，则线下已开启DHCP的客户端使用的IP地址会从您指定的第一个私网网段中分配。
智能接入网关的所属区域。

离线锁定功能用户设定的阈值，大于等于0。

单位：秒。

线下路由同步方式：

- **static**：静态路由。

- **dynamic**：动态路由。
智能接入网关所部署的位置。

是否开启SAG App连接日志审计。

- **true**：开启SAG App连接日志审计。

- **false**：关闭SAG App连接日志审计。

400.errorMessage: The number of available IP addresses of the CIDR block is fewer than the number of SslConnectionSpec.
The number of SslConnectionSpec is invalid.
You must configure the CIDR block of CCN.
You must specify the CIDR blocks of SAG.
The SAG CIDR block is in conflict with the CCN CIDR block.
The specified SNAT IP address is invalid.
You must specify the SAG instance ID.
The specified SAG instance does not exist.
The specified CIDR block is invalid.
The specified SAG CIDR block does not belong to the CCN CIDR block.
The specified SNAT CIDR block is invalid.
The specified SNAT IP address is invalid.
You must specify the CCN CIDR block.
The specified SNAT CIDR block is invalid.
The specified instance does not support this action.
You must configure the SNAT CIDR block of the CCN.
A routable internal IP address belongs to the specified internal CIDR block. You cannot modify this CIDR block.
The specified name is invalid.
The maximum number of static routes for the SAG instance is exceeded.
The specified CIDR format is invalid.
The specified CIDR overlaps with an existing CIDR.
The specified SAG instance has overdue payments. Renew the instance first.
The specified SAG instance has not been activated.
You cannot specify a static CIDR block when the dynamic routing strategy is used.

403.errorMessage: Cidr is conflict, Please Check your input.
The input parameter is missing, please check your input.
The specified smart access gateway instance id is invalid.
Cidr is illegal, please check your input.
User not authorized to operate on the specified resource.
The subnet of the gateway conflicts with the VBR. Modify the subnet first.
The subnet of the gateway conflicts with the VBR. Create a backup relationship first.
The instance has not yet been bound.
The current edition of the smart access gateway does not support this feature.

500.errorMessage: The specified Smart Access Gateway has expired.
The specified Smart Access Gateway has not been activated.
An error occurred while processing your request.

title: 修改智能接入网关的配置
summary: 调用ModifySmartAccessGateway修改智能接入网关的配置。
